title: No naughties profiteroles
ingredients: ['Profiteroles', '150ml cold water', '50g unsalted butter', '85g gluten-free plain white flour', '2 teaspoons xylitol', '2 large eggs', 'Cream filling', '240ml whipping cream', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '45g xylitol', 'Chocolate sauce', '50g plain xylitol chocolate', '60ml double cream', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon xylitol']
